Package XXLChess

Class Game

java.lang.Object
XXLChess.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Tickable
public class Game extends Object implements Tickable
This class represents a game of chess. It includes the players, the board, the current game state, and any animations or warnings that need to be displayed. It also implements the Tickable interface to allow the game state to be updated regularly.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(boolean isPlayerWhite, int playerSeconds, int cpuSeconds, int playerTimeIncrement, int cpuTimeIncrement, int pieceMovementSpeed, int maxMovementTime)
      Constructs a Game with the provided parameters.
      Parameters:
      isPlayerWhite - determines if the player is using the white pieces
      playerSeconds - player's time in seconds
      cpuSeconds - cpu's time in seconds
      playerTimeIncrement - player's time increment per move
      cpuTimeIncrement - cpu's time increment per move
      pieceMovementSpeed - speed of piece movement
      maxMovementTime - maximum time for a movement

    • tick

      public void tick()
      The tick method is called every frame and handles the game logic. This includes checking if the game has ended, checking for in-check incidents, rendering warnings and animations, and handling player and computer turns.
      Specified by:
      tick in interface Tickable

    • checkmateInspection

      public Set<Movement> checkmateInspection()
      Inspects the game for a checkmate situation. If the current player is in check and there are no legal moves, a GameReport is created with a checkmate end reason.
      Returns:
      a Set of legal movements if the current player is in check, or null if not.

    • getGameStatus

      public Game.GameStatus getGameStatus()
      Returns the current game status. The game status can be one of the following: rendering an animation, rendering a warning, the game has ended, it's the human player's turn, or it's the bot's turn.
      Returns:
      the current game status.

    • movePiece

      public void movePiece(Movement m) throws RuleViolationException
      Executes a movement for the current player. Throws an exception if the move would put the player's king in check.
      Parameters:
      m - the movement to execute
      Throws:
      RuleViolationException - if the move is illegal

    • refreshAvailableMoves

      public void refreshAvailableMoves(Board board)
      Refreshes the set of available moves for all pieces on the board.
      Parameters:
      board - the game board to refresh

    • getDangerTiles

      public Set<Tile> getDangerTiles(Piece p)
      Returns a set of tiles that would be dangerous for a given piece to move to.
      Parameters:
      p - the piece to check
      Returns:
      a set of dangerous tiles

    • predictThreats

      public Set<Piece> predictThreats(PlayerAgent attacker, Movement move, Piece subject)
      Predicts the pieces that would threaten a piece after a given move.
      Parameters:
      attacker - the player making the move
      move - the move to consider
      subject - the piece to check for threats against
      Returns:
      a set of pieces that would threaten the subject piece after the move

    • detectThreats

      public Set<Piece> detectThreats(Board board, Piece subject)
      Detects the pieces that could threaten a piece on a given board.
      Parameters:
      board - the board to check
      subject - the piece to check for threats against
      Returns:
      a set of pieces that could threaten the subject piece

    • getAllLegalMovements

      public Set<Movement> getAllLegalMovements(PlayerAgent agent)
      Generates all possible legal moves for a given player.
      Parameters:
      agent - the player for which to generate moves
      Returns:
      a set of all possible legal moves

    • solveIncident

      public Set<Movement> solveIncident(InCheckIncident inc)
      Solves a given InCheckIncident by finding all moves that would remove the king from check.
      Parameters:
      inc - the InCheckIncident to solve
      Returns:
      a set of all moves that would remove the king from check

    • detectInCheck

      public InCheckIncident detectInCheck(PlayerAgent agent)
      Detects if a player's king is in check.
      Parameters:
      agent - the player to check
      Returns:
      an InCheckIncident if the king is in check, or null if not

    • predictInCheck

      public InCheckIncident predictInCheck(PlayerAgent agent, Movement m)
      Predicts if a player's king would be in check after a given move.
      Parameters:
      agent - the player to check
      m - the move to consider
      Returns:
      an InCheckIncident if the king would be in check after the move, or null if not

    • isEnded

      public boolean isEnded()
      Checks if the game is ended.
      Specified by:
      isEnded in interface Tickable
      Returns:
      true if the game is ended, false otherwise

    • getSafeMovements

      public Set<Movement> getSafeMovements(Set<Movement> allMovements)
      Get all movements that don't impose a threat to the king
      Returns:
      all movements that don't impose a threat to the king

    • getCastlingMovement

      public Movement getCastlingMovement(Movement m)
      Retrieves the castling movement based on the given movement.
      Parameters:
      m - the original movement
      Returns:
      the castling movement if valid, or null if not applicable
